short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides a colored tooltip preview for selected text containing hexadecimal color values.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Just select HEX-text, and it will automatically color itself for a couple of seconds.
Last selected color can be copied by clicking extension color.
